titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: We lunched with Morrison, and met there Putnam, the American publisher. He is communicative, humourous [sic], well-informed, and intelligent. After lunch Morrison & I walked in Battersea Park, which is very beautiful, and back to Dean's Yard.
